06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5413/AR5414 Wireless Network Adapter [AR5006X(S) 802.11abg] [168c:001b] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Alpha Networks Inc. RBTBJ-AW 802.11abg Wireless Cardbus Adapter [1948:3aba]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k info dump=== 
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x60
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: 00
ath: Regpair used: 0x60
ieee80211 phy9: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
ath5k: phy9: Atheros AR5414 chip found (MAC: 0xa5, PHY: 0x61)
cfg80211: Calling CRDA for country: US
